summary:
You can become \"The Knight from Hell\"!
This mod add \"Inferno Knight Armor\" set,and some weapons!
And more, they have flame power without any enchanting!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=9][color=Crimson]-Inferno Knight Arms Set-[/color][/size][/font]

[font=Arial Black][size=6][color=Dodgerblue][b]-Description-[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Lucida Sans Unicode]
You can become \"[color=crimson]The Knight from Hell[/color]\"!
This mod add \"\"[color=crimson]Inferno Knight Armor[/color]\" set,and some weapons!
And more, they have [color=Orangered]flame power[/color] [u]without any enchanting[/u]![/font][/size]

[font=Arial Black][size=6][color=Khaki][b]-How to get-[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Lucida Sans Unicode]
You can craft them from ebony armors or weapons,and [color=Orangered]fire salts[/color] and [color=Mediumpurple]ebony ingots[/color].[/font][/size]

[font=Arial Black][size=6][color=Orangered][b]-Effects List-[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Georgia]
Inferno Knight Helmet:[color=crimson]Fire Breath Shout[/color] become stronger by 50%!

Inferno Knight Armor:[color=red]Fire resistance[/color] increases by 50%!

Inferno Knight Gauntlets:Any attacks([u]even unarmed attacks[/u]!) [color=Orangered]burns your enemies[/color]!

Inferno Knight Boots:[color=Red]Walking trails fire way[/color] (as Flame Atronach)!

Inferno Knight Shield:Shield bashing [color=Orangered]burns your enemies[/color]!

Weapons:[color=Orangered]Burn your enemies[/color] without any enchanting!
[/font][/size]

[font=Arial Black][size=6][color=Khaki][b]-Credit-[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[size=3][FONT=Lucida Sans Unicode]
Ewis True Weaponry of Viscounts and Sirrahs Weapon Pack by Ichibu BlutKult
[/font][/size]
author: metametroid
